/* req4700DAO.insertReq4700ReqChangeLogInfo - 요구사항 변경 내용 등록(새로운 REQ_CHG_ID 따기)*/ SELECT COALESCE( SUBSTR(NEW_REQ_CHG_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_REQ_CHG_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'CHG' || TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_REQ_CHG_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(REQ_CHG_ID) AS NEW_REQ_CHG_ID FROM REQ4700 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId# AND A.REQ_CHG_ID LIKE 'CHG' || TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' )
/* req4700DAO.insertReq4700ReqChangeLogInfo - 요구사항 변경 내용 등록 */ INSERT INTO REQ4700 ( PRJ_ID, REQ_ID, REQ_CHG_ID, REQ_CHG_TYPE ,CHG_USR_ID, CHG_DTM, PROCESS_ID, PRE_FLOW_ID ,CHG_FLOW_ID, PRE_CHARGER_ID, CHG_CHARGER_ID ,REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP ,MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #prjId#, #reqId#, #newReqChgId#, #reqChgType# ,#chgUsrId#, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #processId#, #preFlowId# ,#chgFlowId#, #preChargerId#, #chgChargerId# ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #modifyUsrId#, #modifyUsrIp# )
